column4: have you enabled kvm in some way?  are you sure there is still a problem with KVM & VB?
there was as of late last week.  :(  (but "rmmod kvm_intel" then "rmmod kvm" does the trick)
not a problem i'm having but i don't use kvm in any way anymore - use too, but recent VB releases have been amazing
Yeah.  kvm is left in the dust.  *sigh*
